title: My League Client Can't Even!
body: Yea i played for a few hours and got off, now i'm trying to get back on and it doesn't even...I Open my league client, after about 2-3 min it just disappears. Like the league logo comes up in the middle of my screen and few minutes later "POOF" Is Gone. I Am on a MacBook air, don't ask why. I just need help.

replies.body: Try ending all of the league processes (wouldn't have a clue how to do that on a Mac) and re opening in as administrator
Activity monitor is the equivalent of task manager on mac.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3400854#37316170

This is to fix the client on Mac platform

I used to have this problem on my Mac.

What I did was 
>Right click the League of Legends application.
>Click "Show Package Contents"
>Go to "Contents"
>Then go to "LoL"
>Then open "Play League Of Legends"

then from now on, it should work when you open it normally.
